solutions_title: 業界別ソリューション
solutions_intro: 規制要件と運用実態に合わせたソリューション。
solutions_fintech_body: PCI 監視、不正対策インテリジェンス、取締役会向け報告。
solutions_health_body: 患者データ保護、ランサムウェア耐性、HIPAA/GDPR 対応。
solutions_gov_body: 安全な近代化、重要インフラ防御、インシデント対応。
cases_intro: 測定可能なリスク低減を示す実例。
case1_problem: 課題: 標的型 APT により 20 億ドルの IP が危険に。
case1_solution: 解決策: 24/7 のハンティング、横移動の隔離、36 時間でセグメント化。
case1_result: 結果: 流出を阻止し、規制報告を期限内に完了。
case2_problem: 課題: Credential stuffing により不正試行が 18% 増加。
case2_solution: 解決策: 行動分析、MFA 強化、詐欺インテリジェンス統合。
case2_result: 結果: 不正試行を 72% 削減し、信頼スコア向上。
case3_problem: 課題: レガシー基盤が国家レベルの持続的侵入に弱い。
case3_solution: 解決策: Zero Trust 展開、安全な近代化、IR プレイブック。
case3_result: 結果: 封じ込めが 45% 速くなり、耐性が向上。

payment_title: セキュリティレポートを購入
payment_intro: Access cutting-edge threat intelligence and actionable security analysis directly from Aegis Sentinel Labs. Our self-service reports provide immediate, confidential insights—from executive-level threat briefings to detailed technical assessments of your external attack surface. Select a report, complete your secure payment, and download your findings instantly to inform your security strategy.
payment_success_title: 支払いが確認されました。
payment_success_body: 以下からレポートをダウンロードできます。コピーはメールでも送信されます。
payment_download_link: レポートをダウンロード
about_intro_long_1: Founded in 2012 in Zug, Switzerland, Aegis Sentinel delivers elite cyber defense for regulated industries and enterprises where security failure is not an option. We operate where the stakes are highest—finance, healthcare, critical infrastructure, and government sectors—transforming cyber risk into a quantifiable and manageable strategic advantage.
about_intro_long_2: Our mission is built on a foundation of anticipatory intelligence, not just reactive solutions. We combine deep threat research with hands-on adversarial simulation to expose vulnerabilities before they can be exploited. With over 280 specialists across global hubs in Zurich, London, Dubai, Singapore, Berlin, and Boston, our team includes former ethical hackers, intelligence analysts, and incident responders who understand both the attacker’s mindset and the defender’s imperative.
about_intro_long_3: We don’t just protect systems; we strengthen organizational resilience through continuous validation, board-ready reporting, and compliance alignment with ISO 27001, 27701, and 22301 standards. As a Microsoft Intelligent Security Association partner, we integrate cutting-edge technology with human expertise to deliver outcomes—not just alerts.
about_intro_long_4: At Aegis Sentinel, vigilance moves beyond the code. It’s embedded in our culture, our methodologies, and our unwavering commitment to defending the digital frontiers of our clients. We enable organizations to operate with confidence in a contested digital world.
services_intro_long_1: Aegis Sentinel delivers proactive and responsive security programs with measurable outcomes across complex regulatory environments. Our service portfolio is built on a cycle of continuous validation—identifying exposure, demonstrating impact, and implementing defense.
services_intro_long_2_body: We don’t wait for alerts. Our intelligence team and proprietary systems continuously map your publicly exposed attack surface, identifying misconfigurations, outdated systems, and potential entry points before they appear in a breach report. This includes tailored briefings on emerging threats specifically targeting your sector.
services_intro_long_3_body: Going beyond checklist audits, our controlled simulation exercises replicate real-world adversary behavior to test detection and response capabilities. We demonstrate exploit chains in a contained environment, providing clear evidence of risk and actionable remediation guidance.
services_intro_long_4_body: When critical events occur, our global 24/7 SOC and incident commanders provide not just technical containment, but coordinated crisis management, communication support, and forensic analysis to meet regulatory and legal requirements.
services_intro_long_5_body: Security must be woven into operations. We deploy lightweight, adaptive monitoring agents and integrate with your existing infrastructure to provide real-time visibility, anomaly detection, and compliance assurance—turning static defense into a dynamic, learning system.
services_intro_long_6: Every engagement is designed to transition from initial assessment to managed resilience, ensuring that security becomes a sustainable competitive advantage, not just a compliance cost.
solutions_intro_long_1: We move beyond generic frameworks to deliver sector-specific solutions that align with stringent regulatory requirements and the unique operational realities of your industry. Our programs are built on a foundation of deep compliance expertise and threat intelligence tailored to the specific adversaries and vulnerabilities targeting your sector.
solutions_intro_long_2_body: Navigate the complex triad of security, compliance, and customer trust. Our solutions for finance address PCI DSS, GLBA, and SOC 2 requirements while integrating advanced fraud prevention, API security, and real-time transaction monitoring to protect assets and maintain market confidence.
solutions_intro_long_3_body: Protect patient data and secure critical infrastructure without disrupting care. Our healthcare-focused programs ensure HIPAA and GDPR compliance while safeguarding medical devices, securing research data, and building ransomware resilience for hospitals and biotech firms.
solutions_intro_long_4_body: Defend public sector entities and essential services against sophisticated threats. We deliver FedRAMP-aligned solutions, secure modernization pathways for legacy systems, and 24/7 monitoring for operational technology (OT) environments that keep communities functioning.
solutions_intro_long_5_body: Build security into your product and culture. We help technology companies implement robust DevSecOps practices, achieve compliance certifications (ISO 27001, SOC 2), and design secure-by-default architectures that become competitive advantages in global markets.
solutions_intro_long_6: Each solution begins with a collaborative assessment to map regulatory obligations to technical controls, followed by phased implementation and continuous validation. We ensure your security posture not only meets today's requirements but adapts to tomorrow's challenges—turning compliance from a cost center into a framework for resilience.
cases_intro_long_1: Real-world response stories highlighting measurable risk reduction and operational continuity. Our work is defined by measurable outcomes that protect revenue, ensure compliance, and maintain trust. Below are detailed analyses of how our methodology transforms critical vulnerabilities into validated security advantages.
case1_analysis: The threat was not merely technical but existential—targeting the core value of the company. Our response combined tactical containment with strategic regulatory navigation. By demonstrating the exact path of data exfiltration to both technical and executive teams, we transformed the incident from a security problem into a unified business recovery effort. The 36-hour resolution became a benchmark for their operational resilience, leading to an ongoing board-mandated threat simulation program.
case2_analysis: The rising fraud rate was eroding the foundational trust of a FinTech platform. Our solution went beyond blocking attacks; it involved creating a controlled demonstration of the fraud ecosystem’s scalability for leadership. This tangible evidence secured immediate investment in new controls. The 72% reduction directly correlated with a measurable uptick in customer deposit activity, proving that security investment directly enables growth.
case3_analysis: Modernizing critical infrastructure under active threat requires precision. We employed a "validate then migrate" approach, using controlled simulations to prove vulnerabilities in isolated legacy segments before each migration phase. This de-risked the project politically and technically. The 45% improvement in containment speed is now a key performance indicator for their annual security governance review.
cases_methodology_title: The Aegis Sentinel Methodology: How We Guarantee Outcomes
cases_methodology_point_1_body: We quantify risk in terms of business impact—revenue, compliance, operations—not just technical severity.
cases_methodology_point_2_body: Through agreed-upon simulations, we demonstrate the concrete consequences of inaction to secure stakeholder alignment and urgency.
cases_methodology_point_3_body: We implement solutions measured by business continuity metrics, ensuring security becomes a pillar of resilience, not an obstacle to it.
cases_methodology_quote: “The value was not just in stopping the attack, but in the clarity Aegis provided. They showed us exactly what could happen, which made securing the budget and organizational buy-in straightforward.” — CISO, MedCore Devices
cases_methodology_cta_2: Schedule a confidential briefing on your specific threat landscape
blog_intro_long_1: Technical guidance and strategic intelligence on the evolving threat landscape. Welcome to Aegis Sentinel Labs, where our frontline experience is translated into decisive knowledge. We move beyond generic threat alerts to deliver forensic analysis, actionable frameworks, and strategic foresight—equipping both technical teams and executive leadership to navigate cyber risk with confidence.
blog_intro_long_2: Our research philosophy is built on validation, not speculation. Every insight originates from our operational engagements and is stress-tested within our Controlled Threat Validation (CTV) environment. This unique approach allows us to deconstruct adversary campaigns, quantify the efficacy of defenses, and provide evidence-based recommendations you can trust.
blog_intro_long_3: Explore analyses that dissect the ‘how’ and illuminate the ‘so what’, turning complex threats into clear action plans. Discover playbooks that bridge the gap between technical response and business continuity, ensuring resilience is embedded in your strategy, not just your infrastructure.
blog_intro_long_4: [Subscribe to Aegis Sentinel Insights] for exclusive, in-depth briefings delivered to your inbox. For a confidential discussion on the threats most pertinent to your organization, [contact our Threat Intelligence team].
payment_crypto_blurb: Pay with crypto. Protect digital sovereignty. Our crypto-only checkout maximizes privacy, removes chargeback risk, and keeps delivery available 24/7.
payment_product_1_body: Quarterly overview of the most relevant threats for your sector, formatted for executive leadership. Includes five emerging attack vectors, board-level guidance, and regulatory impact analysis.
payment_product_2_body: A detailed map of publicly accessible assets and associated risk, including misconfigurations, outdated systems, and prioritized remediation guidance.
payment_product_2_format: Format: PDF report + CSV data appendix.
payment_product_3_body: A comprehensive maturity benchmarking package combining executive and technical reports plus a 60-minute analyst consultation.
payment_product_3_format: Format: PDF report bundle + live session.
payment_product_4_body: For organizations requiring continuous protection and deep integration. Subscriptions deliver monthly reports, analyst access, and real-time monitoring integration.
payment_product_4_format: Includes: bespoke configuration, recurring briefings, real-time monitoring.
payment_guarantee_body: Payments are processed by our PCI-DSS compliant partner. Your data and reports are strictly confidential and used only for the requested analysis.
payment_guarantee_use_body: Reports are informational and designed to inform decisions or begin professional collaboration.
payment_crypto_toggle: Why do we accept payment only in cryptocurrency?
payment_crypto_body:
Why does Aegis Sentinel accept payment in cryptocurrency?

Our commitment to crypto payments is not a trend—it is a logical extension of our mission to protect digital sovereignty.

Transaction security as a principle. Traditional payment systems are frequent targets for supply-chain attacks and social engineering. Cryptographically secured transactions eliminate whole classes of risk tied to card data leaks, chargeback fraud, and intermediary compromise. We apply the same cryptographic rigor to financial operations as we do to your data.

Privacy by default. Our clients often operate in environments where even the act of discussing enhanced cyber defense is sensitive. Crypto payments reduce the digital footprint associated with purchasing our reports, adding an additional layer of operational security (OPSEC).

Operational resilience. Decentralized networks run 24/7/365 without geographic restrictions or banking holidays. This guarantees you can access critical intelligence exactly when needed, without waiting for third-party approvals.

Technological integrity. We believe in a future built on transparent, verifiable protocols. By accepting crypto, we affirm our commitment to those principles: verifiability, immutability, and censorship resistance.

For enterprise clients: We understand that accounting procedures may require traditional invoices. For contracts above $10,000, we offer a hybrid option with all required documentation. Contact us to discuss details.

This is more than a payment method. It is a statement of our principles.
